name: JS Syntax. Playing in the sandbox

0.name: Select the correct statements about the programs
A computer program is a set of instructions that a computer executes

1.name: A computer program is a set of instructions that are executed by a human
Programs are executed and consist of

2.name: Programs are written in programming languages

0.name: Tells the computer what it should do

1.name: Tells you what you want the programmer to do

4.name: A programming language is an add-on to a computer language that allows a programmer to write programs

5.name: Programming languages were created by humans to help programmers write programs in a human-readable language, not a computer language

6.name: Instructions written in a programming language are not understood by the computer, so

0.name: They will translate them into the language of the computer

1.name: The computer will execute them as they are written
